attributes.action: Reverse the Ban on Puberty Blockers for Under-18s
attributes.additional_details: The trans youth community already faces enough discrimination and issues each and every day. The government should be on their side, but instead, they are blocking an essential need many trans youth have. This has to stop.
attributes.background: The government needs to immediately reverse the ban on Puberty Blockers for Under-18s as it will have a detrimental effect on the trans youth community that already faces enough issues.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Lift restrictions on prescribing puberty blockers to trans children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702538
